title: How to self publish my book in India with minimum investment - Quora

response.answer_text: A self publishing house is your one stop solution. They have various packages that you can explore and choose services as per your needs. This will help you get done with publishing affordably without major investment. They also pay 100% commission on the sales of your book. A traditional publishing house is also an option, but in the end you would get oy 25% of commission on the sales of your book. Lastly, an online publication, where you are required to do everything I.e. proofreading, editing, cover design etc. They only serve as a market place for your book. I would suggest you to consultant a expert in the publishing domain and then make an informed choice. You can also reach out to me at Betagram Publishers a self-publishing house I'm a co-founder of. Have a Great Day!

Hi, Self-publishing is when an author is in full control of the process of publishing his/her book, both fiction and non-fiction, poetry, etc. The cost of self-publishing a book will depend on: The processes that the author is looking to hire expertise eg does he want to take editing.The level of skill he would like to hire.The difficulty level of the task required and the time required to complete the task eg an academic book usually has higher level of difficulty in formatting, hence higher cost.The typical book publishing services will include the following: EditingCover design and illustrationFormatting and interior designPrinting of your book both fiction or technicalDistribution and supplyCreation of E-book and its distributionBook sales trackingMarketingThe author needs to decide the following:Which of these steps he has the wherewithal and the inclination to carry out by himself. Which ones he would like to take the help of a professional publisher. This is the first and very important step. Once this is decided the next step is to compare cost of different self-publishing companies. Good Luck!

When you have decided to self publish your book, it means you want to be the publisher. And to minimise the publishing investment you have to think like a publisher and understand the publishing business. To understand any business you need to meet the people related to that business. And in your case the best would be to look for a literary agent or a book coach.

For first time Authors publication is a big issue since no publisher wants to take the risk. Unless you are a celebrity in your field. The usual process is to pay the cost of publication along with proportionate cost of publicity. Self publication is pretty difficult as you might not know the suppliers of papers, printers etc and also do not know how to market your copies.
